channel.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
channel.description:
Meh, i saw STH's post and figured i have never tried a lightbulb, i gave it a shot. But to me it sometimes looks unrealistic (not sure if its from constantly looking at it).
But im tired of making stuff that doesn't look real, and remaking it and hoping it will. I wont improve without others input.
[img]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/1769/bulbor7.png[/img]
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8663/lightbulbsn8.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/2237/lightbulbscu9.jpg[/img]

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Frell looks a bit like you put a condom over a light tbh not being mean but its a bit plasticy/rubbery

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Oh yes, I know there are clear models, but if he were to choose clear it would require a lot more work than he’s willing to put into it(obviously?). As for a solid bulb, they leave a small visible layer on the bottom of the bulb, to allow light to enter:

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:16, topic:232977”]Light bulbs aren’t a solid, you can see right through them. There’s a dim layer of powder inside of every light bulb that makes it appear more solid, but not enough to be plastic. The ending isn’t glossy, like you want it to be, it is a solid. It’s just a small chunk of metal, nothing more.

[/quote]

Well there are bulbs in my house that are clear, and there are some which are way more solid than those. Like completely white.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Light bulbs aren’t a solid, you can see right through them. There’s a dim layer of powder inside of every light bulb that makes it appear more solid, but not enough to be plastic. The ending isn’t glossy, like you want it to be, it is a solid. It’s just a small chunk of metal, nothing more.

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:

Google brushed metals then…

[/quote]
I couldnt find any others, besides, i want to learn how to do it myself so if i need to later i will be able to.[/quote]

I’m not saying google a material. I’m saying google what they are so you know how to make them.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The wood texture is just the same hardwood texture i have used in almost everything i made, but i added a .2 marble bump to it and small reflection.

And im not sure how to make metal looked brushed, the one you see in that picture was pre-made and looks very weird.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Close, but no tomato.

That wood texture in the first one is excellent really. Don’t know if the HDR is blurred or the texture has some dispersion but it looks great. I’d blur the reflection of the bulb a little more too though.

The bulb itself is getting better. I’d make the rings extrude more, and they’re just horizontal rings now, they’re not actually screws lol.

The materials are what is killing it though.

Metals looks nothing like metal, more like some fantasy shader. And the bulb needs to be less reflective.

Read full topic

@Frell wrote:

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

No the opposite. Casing > bulb, not bulb > casing.

And contact should be bumped out of the casing as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:232977”]

I beveled the base a little bit to give the appearance like it was going in.

And im not sure how to get the ‘brushed’ look so i used a premade texture.

and the contact was black, but it was hard to see.[/quote]

Kinda looks like it’s wrapped in plastic near the base…

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)

item.description:

item.title: [C4D] Lightbulb (lol)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

There should be three separate objects. The bulb, the casing, and the contact.

Bulb is much more white and less reflective and should enter the casing. Right now they fuse.

The casing needs to be more like a brushed metal instead of a shiny silver paint.

The contact at the bottom should also be a reflective black.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Adam:

The only reason it looks unrealistic to me is because it’s way too glossy.

I never thought of that, people always tell me to tone down on the reflection, ill try
